channel.title: Some Commands I'm Making... First Help Section Thread Since July ...Help Plz?

item.title: Some Commands I'm Making... First Help Section Thread Since July ...Help Plz?
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

well, i cant see why this doesnt work so help me plz, kai?

[CODE]if(command.startsWith(“mult”)) {
try {
int mn1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,8));
int mn2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10));
int answerofmult = mn2*mn1;
sendMessage(answerofmult+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("[Server] Use As “::Mult 0005 0005"”);
}
}
if(command.startsWith(“dev”)) {
try {
int mn1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,7));
int mn2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));
int answerofmult = mn2/mn1;
sendMessage(answerofmult+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("[Server] Use As “::dev 0005 0005"”);
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“sub”)) {
try {
int mn1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,7));
int mn2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));
int answerofmult = mn2-mn1;
sendMessage(answerofmult+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("[Server] Use As “::sub 0005 0005"”);
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“add”)) {
try {
int mn1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,7));
int mn2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));
int answerofmult = mn2+mn1;
sendMessage(answerofmult+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("[Server] Use As “::add 0005 0005"”);
}
}[/CODE]
